get.summary: generate a OCMProvider with local data and send it as DataResponse. This replaces the old PHP file ocm-provider/index.php
Get a preview by file path

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Path of the file

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: Width of the preview. A width of -1 will use the original image width.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Height of the preview. A height of -1 will use the original image height.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: Preserve the aspect ratio

parameters.name: forceIcon
parameters.description: Force returning an icon

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: How to crop the image

parameters.name: mimeFallback
parameters.description: Whether to fallback to the mime icon if no preview is available

303.description: Redirect to the mime icon url if mimeFallback is true
